EmailTemplate.name: ASI TnE HK Corp Card Generated Email Template
EmailTemplate.subject: T&E Card Claim for {!ASI_TnE_ClaimHeader__c.ASI_TnE_Sys_Payee__c} has been uploaded for your action (#{!ASI_TnE_ClaimHeader__c.Name})
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!ASI_TnE_ClaimHeader__c.OwnerFullName},
A Travel & Entertainment Claim form {!ASI_TnE_ClaimHeader__c.Name} for Corp Card has been generated.
Please click this link {!ASI_TnE_ClaimHeader__c.Link} to view and fulfill the Travel & Entertainment form details.
